chat.noAgentsFound: No agents found. Create agents via /v1/agents endpoint.
chat.mcpServerTooltipSingle: Select an MCP server to test tools directly.
chat.mcpServerTooltipMulti: Select MCP servers to use in your conversation.
chat.vectorStoreTooltip: Select vector store(s) to use for this LLM API call. You can set up your vector store
chat.guardrailsTooltip: Select guardrail(s) to use for this LLM API call. You can set up your guardrails
chat.policiesTooltip: Select policy/policies to apply to this LLM API call. Policies define which guardrails are applied based on conditions. You can set up your policies
chat.emptyState: Start a conversation, generate an image, or handle audio
chat.uploadImages: Click or drag images to upload
chat.uploadImagesHint: Support for PNG, JPG, JPEG formats. Multiple images supported.
chat.uploadAudio: Click or drag audio file to upload
chat.uploadAudioHint: Support for MP3, MP4, MPEG, MPGA, M4A, WAV, WEBM formats. Max file size: 25 MB.

samplePrompt.salesCsv: Generate sample sales data CSV and create a chart
samplePrompt.providersPng: Create a PNG bar chart comparing AI gateway providers including LiteLLM
samplePrompt.pricingCsv: Generate a CSV of LLM pricing data and visualize it as a line chart

a2aPrompt.help: What can you help me with?

suggestedPrompt.email: Draft a polite email requesting a meeting

inputPlaceholder.imageEdits: Describe how you want to edit the image...
inputPlaceholder.speech: Enter text to convert to speech...
inputPlaceholder.transcription: Optional: Add context or prompt for transcription...
inputPlaceholder.imageGeneration: Describe the image you want to generate...
